short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free, Fast, AI-Powered Job Applicant Review for Recruiters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free, Fast, AI-Powered Job Applicant Review for Recruiters

Upgrade Your Hiring Process

The AI-cruiter extension is now FREE for everyone (since version 1.4.0). Review up to 2,000 job applicants per month with AI-powered summaries (in about 5 seconds each) and fitness ratings tailored to your job descriptions.

Stay Ahead of the Curve

Unlike most recruiters, you can efficiently review every applicant. Never miss a qualified candidate again. Find top talent quickly and easily from a vast pool of motivated applicants.

AI-Powered Efficiency

This extension doesn't replace your judgment; it generates customizable summaries based on resumes and assigns fitness scores for each applicant based on your selected job description.

The Power of Large Language Models

Leveraging advanced LLMs like ChatGPT 4 and Llama 3, AI-cruiter empowers you to review hundreds of applicants in minutes. Bookmark promising candidates and create/customize prompts for different jobs.

Seamless Integration

The extension works out-of-the-box with popular applicant tracking systems (ATS) like Lever, Greenhouse, JazzHR, Workable, and Breezy.

Built by Recruiters, for Recruiters (workinbiotech.com/recruiting)

Developed by recruiters who understand your challenges, AI-cruiter is already used daily by dozens of recruiters across various industries, including tech and biotech.
